members.name: features
members.documentation: An array of feature objects indicating the feature name and its status.

members.name: enabled
members.documentation: True if the feature is enabled, otherwise false.

methods.name: GetFeatureStatus
documentation: GetFeatureStatus allows you to retrieve the status of a cluster feature.

params.name: feature
documentation: vvols: Enable the Virtual Volumes (VVOLs) cluster feature.

methods.name: EnableFeature
documentation: EnableFeature allows you to enable cluster features that are disabled by default.

params.name: feature
documentation: vvols: Enable the Virtual Volumes (VVOLs) cluster feature.
